title: Realizing the Rollup Centric Roadmap with Rollup-Boost: A Cybernetic Lens on Protocol Development
description: L2s are the future, but they're also the past. At this point it's clear that your phone is most likely an L6. With a cybernetic lens, let's examine the feedback loops between L1, L2, and beyond and form community standards around multiprovers, distributed block building, inclusion guarantees and more that feed back into L1.
